item.title: Dropbox ignore files/directories
item.description: Ignoring files or directories in dropbox is a hard thing, I thought it has like git, a .gitignore to config that, but no, we need to do a command for each file/dir, for example to ignore the files that creates a lightroom catalog (.lrcat) we need to do: xattr -w com.dropbox.ignored 1 /Users/username/Dropbox/lightroom/2021-v10\ Previews.lrdata xattr -w com.dropbox.ignored 1 /Users/username/Dropbox/lightroom/2021-v10\ Previews.lrdata xattr -w com.dropbox.ignored 1 /Users/username/Dropbox/lightroom/2021-v10\ Helper.lrdata and to not longer ignore files we need this command:
